Literature.Title: Antimicrobial peptide therapeutics for cystic fibrosis.
Literature.Author: Zhang L, Parente J, Harris SM, Woods DE, Hancock RE, Falla TJ

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli UB1005(MIC=64µg/ml),Salmonella enterica serovar Typhimurium(MIC=64µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=32µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=8-16µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa M76(MIC=8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa M917(MIC=16µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa M1251(MIC=8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa M1426(MIC=8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa R70(MIC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=32µg/ml),Candida albicans(MIC=16µg/ml),Pseudomonas stutzeri(MIC=4µg/ml),Pseudomonas fluorescens(MIC=8µg/ml),Ralstonia pickettii(MIC=8µg/ml),Stenotrophomonas maltophilia(MIC=4µg/ml),Achromobacter xylosoxidans(MIC=64µg/ml)
